mapper.update: MERGE /*+ NO_PARALLEL */ INTO CART_ITEM ci USING ( SELECT #{cartId} AS cart_id, #{productId} AS product_id, #{tripId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AS trip_id FROM dual ) src ON ( ci.cart_id = src.cart_id AND ci.product_id = src.product_id AND NVL(ci.trip_id, -1) = NVL(src.trip_id, -1) AND ci.status = 'PENDING' ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ci.quantity = ci.quantity + #{quantity}, ci.updated_at = SYSTIMESTAMP, ci.updated_by = #{actorId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_item_id, cart_id, product_id, trip_id, quantity, status, created_by) VALUES (cart_item_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cartId}, #{productId}, #{tripId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{quantity}, 'PENDING', #{actorId})
mapper.select: SELECT cart_item_id AS cartItemId, product_id AS productId, quantity FROM CART_ITEM WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId} AND NVL(trip_id, -1) = NVL(#{tripId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, -1) AND status = 'PENDING'
